item.title: Ffmpeg
item.author: Author
item.description: Reference official https://ffmpeg.org blog https://fireship.io/lessons/ffmpeg-useful-techniques/ node js https://www.npmjs.com/package/fluent-ffmpeg example concatenate ffmpeg -f concat -i vids.txt -c copy out.mp4 vids.txt: 1 2 3 file 'name1.mov' file 'name2.mov' file 'name3.mov' type convention ffmpeg -i in.mp4 out.mov
